doctor.name: Dr. Nibedita Roy Dola
doctor.info: Dr. Nibedita Roy Dola is a Gynecologist in Mymensingh. Her qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (OBGYN), MCPS (OBGYN). She is a Consultant, Obstetrics & Gynecology at Charanchal 20 Bed Hospital, Barisal. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Nibedita Roy Dola at Popular Diagnostic Center, Mymensingh is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Akter Jahan
doctor.info: Dr. Akter Jahan is a Gynecologist in Mymensingh. Her qualification is MBBS, DGO (OBGYN), FCPS (OBGYN), Training (Infertility). She is a Associate Professor, Obstetrics & Gynecology at Community Based Medical College & Hospital. She regularly provides treatment to her patients at Union Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh. Practicing hour of Dr. Akter Jahan at Union Specialized Hospital, Mymensingh is Sat, Tues & Thursday.
